title: Hour 1 - Tom Verducci (07-23-20)
itunes:title: Hour 1 - Tom Verducci (07-23-20)
description:
The Los Angeles Dodgers signed MLB superstar right fielder Mookie Betts to a massive deal, the Toronto Blue Jays have no home and Sports Illustrated's Tom Verducci stops in to discuss Opening Day for Major League Baseball.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
